review: This thing is worth every penny and more. I couldn't quite give it five stars because it won't let you play your own content on tv, which was one of the things I was looking forward to. Other than that the device is just amazing, fast, and extremely easy to use. No need for a smart tv. :3

review: Works great and really easy set up. Now I can enjoy Netflix and YouTube on my tv streaming from my tablet and phone

review: This works for exactly what I needed it for, which is watching shows/movies from my browser, and I don't have to use my Ps3 to watch Netflix or Hulu. However, I wish that there was an option that allowed the episodes to keep playing, like they do when you watch online or on the Ps3. Other than that, I really enjoy using Chromecast.

review: Works great. I love this thing. Does exactly what it says, you can even stream podcasts from beyondpod which I already have.
